briefdescription.para: The text which appears above the axis.
The text which appears underneath the x axis.
The text which appears to the left of the y axis.
A (max) length-2 vector detailing the visual range of the plot on the x axis. If length is zero, uses gnuplot auto-scaling.
A (max) length-2 vector detailing the visual range of the plot on the x axis. If length is zero, uses gnuplot auto-scaling.
If true, uses logarithmic scaling on the x axis.
If true, interprets the x axis as a temporal coordinate.
If true, interprets the y axis as a temporal coordinate.
If false, uses logarithmic scaling on the x axis.
If true, overlays a grid onto the plot.
RotationAngle of xtics.
Rotation Angle of ytics.
The font size used to write both the Axis::xlabel and Axis::ylabel (cannot be different for x/y). If < 0, uses the value of gnuplot::globalFontSize.
The font size used to write Axis::title. If < 0, uses the value of gnuplot::globalFontSize.
The font size used to write the legend, if active. If < 0, uses the value of gnuplot::globalFontSize.
The directory reserved for this axis to write its data to file for gnuplot to later scoop up.
A vector of data detailing what should be plotted, and what it looks like, accessed during Axis::Show()
If true, shows a legend on the axis.
The current counter for how many plots/lines have been added to the axis, used to index Axis::Data.
The string into which the Axis::Show() function puts all its data.
Default, empty constructor (necessary for std::vector<Axis> to exist, even if never called)
Expected constructor, generates a random id for itself, and generates a temporary directory in which it stores its data.

parameterdescription.para: The temporary folder generated by JSL::gnuplot, into which all temp data goes

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< T > &x, const std::vector< S > &y, NameValuePair< Ts >... args)
memberdef.name: Plot

briefdescription.para: Adds a line plot to the axis, plotting x against y, and using the args to define what the line looks like.

parameterdescription.para: The x coordinates of the data to be plotted
The y coordinates of the data t be plotted, must be the same length as x
A variadic list of NameValuePair objects, used to define the properties of the line

simplesect.para: A reference to the generated JSL::PlotData object, allowing for post-facto modification of the linestyle.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< T > &x, const std::vector< S > &y, NameValuePair< Ts >... args)
memberdef.name: Scatter

briefdescription.para: Adds a scatter plot to the axis, plotting x against y, and using the args to define what the line looks like.

parameterdescription.para: The x coordinates of the data to be plotted
The y coordinates of the data t be plotted, must be the same length as x
A variadic list of NameValuePair objects, used to define the properties of the line

simplesect.para: A reference to the generated JSL::PlotData object, allowing for post-facto modification of the linestyle.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< T > &x, const std::vector< S > &y, NameValuePair< Ts >... args)
memberdef.name: Chart

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::vector< T > &x, const std::vector< S > &y, const std::vector< std::vector< R > > &z, NameValuePair< Ts >... args)
memberdef.name: Map

briefdescription.para: The command which generates the gnuplot scripting code for plotting the data on this axis.

simplesect.para: The string corresponding to the gnuplot script, must be written to file to be actionable

briefdescription.para: Simple setter for range_x.

parameterdescription.para: The lower bound of the x range
The upper bound of the x range

briefdescription.para: Simple setter for Axis::range_y.

parameterdescription.para: The lower bound of the y range
The upper bound of the y range

briefdescription.para: Simple setter for Axis::xlabel.
Simple setter for Axis::ylabel.
Setter for Axis::xlabel which also sets the font size of the axis text.
Setter for Axis::ylabel which also sets the font size of the axis text.
Simple setter for Axis::isLog_x.
Simple setter for Axis::isLog_y.
Simple setter for Axis::isTime_x.
Simple setter for Axis::isTime_y.
Simple setter for Axis::xTicAngle.
Simple setter for Axis::yTicAngle;.
Simple setter for Axis::legendActive.
Simple setter for Axis::title.
Setter for Axis::title which also sets the fontsize for the title.
Setter for Axis::gridActive.
Sets the fontsize of one of the texts associated with the axis.

parameterdescription.para: The identifier of the text to be changed

memberdef.argsstring: (int n, std::vector< double > start, std::vector< double > end)
memberdef.name: SetColourMap

briefdescription.para: Called when data added to the axis. Increments the data counter, and generates a filename and file into which the plot data will be saved.

simplesect.para: The name of the file generated to store the data

briefdescription.para: Used to add unique properties to Axis::WriteCommand during the Axis::Show() phase, followed by a linebreak.

parameterdescription.para: A property to be written to file

briefdescription.para: Called during Axis::Show(), writes the data associated with the i-th line to the Axis::WriteCommand.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the data to be written

briefdescription.para: Generates a string for either the x or y axis value of the logarithm toggle, which is then piped to Axis::AddProperty.

parameterdescription.para: Either value of Axis::isLog_x or Axis::isLog_y

briefdescription.para: Generates a string for either the x or y axis value of the range, which is then piped to Axis::AddProperty.

parameterdescription.para: Either value of Axis::xrange or Axis::yrange

detaileddescription.para: An axis is a single instance of a plotting grid on the screen. Multiple such axes can exist simultaneously (via gnuplot::SetMultiplot()), with each axis tracking their own data and properties individually.
